message.content: "cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR". The paper discusses a scalable approach to learn video-based question answering, which involves natural language processing, computer vision, and machine learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is "cs.CV" (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), followed by "cs.CL" (Computation and Language) and "cs.AI" (Artificial Intelligence). "cs.LG" (Machine Learning) and "cs.IR" (Information Retrieval) are also possible sub-categories, as the paper involves training and evaluating various machine learning models and deals with information retrieval from video descriptions.
